sentence.text: Differentiated embryo chondrocyte expressed gene 1 (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II), a crucial cell differentiation mediator and apoptosis inhibitor, is abundantly expressed in various types of human cancer and is associated with malignant tumor progression.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: As poor differentiation and low apoptosis are closely associated with poor survival rates and a poor response to radio/chemotherapy in patients with cancer, the prognostic value of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression was examined in the present study and its correlation with response to temozolomide (TMZ) chemotherapy was analyzed in patients with glioma.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression was analyzed by immunohistochemistry in 157 samples of newly diagnosed glioma and 63 recurrent glioblastoma cases that relapsed during TMZ chemotherapy.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression was also compared with the apoptosis index determined by TdT‑mediated dUTP nick ending‑labeling assay in recurrent glioblastomas.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The antiglioma effect of TMZ in establishment of mitotic spindle orientation epidermis development xenografts with negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression was examined in vivo.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: High expression of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, which was significantly associated with high pathological tumor grade and poor response to TMZ chemotherapy, was demonstrated to be an unfavorable independent prognostic factor and predicted poor survival in patients with newly diagnosed glioma.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In patients with recurrent glioblastoma, there was a negative correlation between negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression and the apoptotic index.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
